description:
==============================================================

EXTREMELY USEFUL TO UNDERSTAND THE BASIC PL/SQL 11g CONCEPTS

===============================================================

In this course, you’ll learn PL/SQL Fundamentals training introduces you to PL/SQL then engage in demonstrations and hands-on practice to reinforce the fundamental concepts. You’ll use Oracle SQL Developer to develop these program units.

Learn to:

Overview of PL/SQL,

Introduction to SQL Developer,

PL/SQL Language Fundaments,

PL/SQL Data Types,

Interacting With Oracle Server,

Control Structures,

Composite Datatypes,

Cursors,

Exception Handling,

Procedures,

Functions,

Managing Subprograms
title: Oracle PL/SQL 11g - Fundamentals
